name: dop / development operations pipeline
tagline: development operations pipeline / collection of tools and conventions based on chef and vagrant for local development and remote deployment
body:
### Description
This framework provides a common structure for projects and applications which may be developed locally and deployed remotely on a server. It provides flexible components which can be mixed and matched to only contain the specific services needed.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
